duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess and observe patients to form comprehensive assessments and document findings
Establish a therapeutic alliance with each patient, collaborate, and focus on the patient's needs
Formulate a comprehensive treatment plan integrating the initial assessment, coordinate care with primary medical providers, and evaluate/revising treatment plans based on the most current assessment
Maintain a dynamic caseload and ensure quality care throughout each case

education_certification.credential: Relevant licensure or certification as a Primary Therapist
